title: A SIMPLE AND EFFICIENT PREPARATION OF METHOXYMETHYL ESTERS OF PENICILLINS AND CEPHALOSPORINS

reference.unstructured: Flynn, E. H. 1972.Cephalosporins and Penicilins, 171New York: Academic Press. R. B. Morin, M. Gorman, inChemistry and Biology ofβ-Lactam Antibiotics, Vol. 3, p. 379, Academic Press, New York, NY, 1982
The alkylation of penicilins is accompanied by a strong exotherm. In the case of 2 and 3, the reaction mixtures were cooled to -10°
Since cefotaxime triethylammonium salt is less soluble in acetonitrile compared to other cephalosporins, it is neccesary to increase of the amount of solvent to 150 mL
